text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that in the American system, the copyright holder could choose to pursue actual damages or statutory damages. The candidate answer discusses U.S. remedies in Section 5.2, stating: 'File a civil lawsuit... Seek: (i) preliminary injunction, (ii) actual damages + profits, (iii) statutory damages (up to $150,000 per work for willful infringement), (iv) attorney\u2019s fees.' This explicitly mentions both 'actual damages' (as part of 'actual damages + profits') and 'statutory damages,' thus satisfying the requirement.", "criterion_id": "661ecb64-b694-403f-97ea-781b4eca98f4"}
